recipesJson.name: Cinna-le-mon
recipesJson.author: Tourise
recipesJson.description:
A base cookie flavor with lemon.

The danish swirl makes the cinnamon, the coconut gives it a slight coconut flavor and texture, the marshmallow to sweeten and the biscuit as, well, a biscuit.
The lemon sicily was added as a top fruity note, to represent fruity bits you'd find in cereal.

real good of the shake. made 50ml to see how it steeps.
